instructions: In day view, tap the Add button at the top right. Fill in the event details. Enter the title and location of the event, the start and end times, how often it repeats, and so on.

Tap the event, then tap Edit at the top right. In the event details, tap Alert. Choose when you want to be reminded. For example, At time of event, 5 minutes before, or another choice. Note: If you add the address of the event s location, you re reminded in time to leave from your current location, based on traffic conditions.
